name: Ducks in a Field of Hamburgers
name_original: Ducks in a Field of Hamburgers
description:
Ducks in a Field of Hamburgers is an interactive experience that I made using Processing. It was written in only 15 lines (the source code for this game is one of the screenshots) and it is a very simple art program. I'm just messing around with Processing right now, so don't expect something wildly professional or anything like that. Enjoy the game/experience!

Use the mouse.
